name: Cow
description: A cow is white with black spots. You will usually find a cow on a farm. They produce milk.

name: Chicken
description: A Chicken is a small bird with a red beak. You can find chickens in large groups on a farm. Chickens lay eggs.

name: Sheep
description: A Sheep is a fluffy animal. You can find sheeps on a farm within a large patch of grass behind a fence. Sheeps produce wool.
